MLZAM.PA.summary: ZCCM Investments Holdings Plc, an investment holding company, primarily holds investments in the copper mining sector in Zambia. It is involved in the mining and manufacturing of limestone products; coal and gold mining; provision of environmental and technical services; and commercial banking business. The company was founded in 1982 is based in Lusaka, Zambia. ZCCM Investments Holdings Plc is a subsidiary of Industrial Development Corporation ltd.
